amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to insert a complete new text comprised of the Senate companion measure, S. 1297.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part A of House Report 114-127 to substitute the text of S. 1297.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Edwards amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 236 (Roll no. 261).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Edwards amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 236 (Roll no. 261).

House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Ms. Edwards.
